short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Interpret your patients SMS responses using Ai

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
**THIS VERSION HAS BEEN REPLACED**

Please download the latest version from the Chrome store here:

https://chromewebstore.google.com/detail/abby-for-cliniko/cppckmcdmapbonkfmlfgkhflfjfnhoio?hl=en-GB&authuser=0

👉👉 KEY FEATURES 👈👈


🧠 AI-POWERED SMS INTERPRETATION

Leverages advanced AI to accurately interpret patient responses to SMS reminders, categorising them as confirmations, cancellations, or reschedule requests.

📆 DYNAMIC CALENDAR INTEGRATION
 
Enhances your Cliniko calendar with colour-coded statuses, enabling quick identification of appointment confirmations and adjustments requests.
 
📝 AUTOMATED APPOINTMENT NOTE UPDATES 

Directly post patient SMS responses into Cliniko appointment notes, ensuring accurate and accessible communication records all in one place.

🔒 DATA SECURITY AND PRIVACY

Abby.clinic does not store any sensitive patient data, no names, no numbers, no addresses. Just appointment ID's and message responses. The data Abby does store is encrypted and deleted as soon as we no longer need it.

😌 USER-FRIENDLY SETUP

Offers an intuitive and straightforward installation process, complemented by minimal operational management. One account per clinic, display status at the click of a button. 

🪄 OUR OWN LANGUAGE MODEL - NO OPENAI

Abby uses its own Ai language model. It does not utilise 3rd party providers like OpenAi meaning any data is always in our control. Its never shared or utalised by anyone else given users the confidence to enjoy the benefits of Ai without the downsides. 

 

👉👉 BENEFITS 👈👈


⌚️ SAVE TIME AND REDUCE NO SHOWS

Automates the confirmation process, significantly reducing manual tasks and minimising missed appointments.

🤗 ENHANCE ADMINISTRATORS SATISFACTION

Significantly reduce administrators tasking allowing them to focus more on patient satisfaction and less on button clicking.

😎 EASY INTEGRATION

Seamlessly integrates with existing Cliniko accounts

🤓 COMPREHENSIVE SUPPORT AND UPDATES

Ensures a hassle-free experience with dedicated support and continuous enhancements to keep your clinic at the forefront of technological advancements.

 

🚀🚀 GETTING STARTED 🚀🚀

Embark on a 14-day free trial to explore the comprehensive benefits of Abby Clinic. Choose from flexible subscription plans available in AUD, NZD, and GBP, designed to accommodate clinics of all sizes. Experience effortless installation and dedicated support, guiding you every step of the way.

Transform your clinic's appointment management today with Abby Clinic. Elevate your productivity, improve patient communications, and achieve operational excellence.
